casebody.data:
Felix I. GASPARD, Appellant(s)/Petitioner(s),
v.
BAC HOME LOANS SERVICING, LP, Appellee(s)/Respondent(s), CASE NO.: 3D17-2351 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. NOVEMBER 06, 2017 ROTHENBERG, C.J., and FERNANDEZ and LUCK, JJ., concur.

Upon consideration, petitioner's motion to proceed in forma pauperis is hereby denied.

Following review of the emergency petition for a writ of mandamus, it is ordered that said petition is hereby denied.
